root.name: Space Invaders Anniversary
root.description: Space Invaders Anniversary as 9 different games: - T.T. Space Invaders Monochrome Version - T.T. Space Invaders Color Version - T.T. Space Invaders Cellophane Version - Space Invaders Upright Version- Space Invaders Part II Upright Version - Space Invaders Part II Color Version - Space Invaders Double - Space Invaders 3D - Space Invaders VS There's also Space Invaders Secret files, which is a collection of documents related to the series. The menu of the game is in shape of a Arcade room with each game belonging to a different arcade.
